alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 12:58AM CST until January 03 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR DESHA...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 1258 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of De Witt to near Merrisach Lake to near Dumas, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dumas... Gillett... Mitchellville... Watson... Yancopin... Omega... Mills... Merrisach Lake... Trusten Holder WMA... Kelso... Arkansas Post... Garrett Bridge... Pendleton... Gourd... Tichnor... Reedville... Morgan Point Recreation Area... Yukon... Weber... Pickens in Desha County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
